about_the_game:
Edenfall: Legacy of the first Wardens is a story-driven action adventure combining exploration with combat. Untangle the mysteries of Eden - a forgotten realm as Venya, a young girl. With help of Alkina the Spirit Fox you gain magic powers and learn how to transform into animals, unleashing their unique skills to restore the Crystal of Light.

Eden, once a united realm, now shattered into pieces, offers great diversity while exploring. Follow the legends of an old civilization passing lush meadows, parched wastelands, snowy tundra and deep forests. Explore hidden places, solve puzzles and push back creatures from the void to ultimately bring back peace to Eden!

  • Explore mystical places and their secrets

  • Find crystal shards and fragments to increase your powers in hidden places all over Eden.

  • Untangle the past and learn about the First Wardens.

Fight against evil creatures

Edenfall is overrun with evil creatures, and you must defeat them! Making best use of every strenght of your forms nothing can stand in your way! Each form has its unique combo system to trigger special effects on your enemies.

Gain powerful abilities

  • Transform into three different spirit animals, each with a unique set of skills.

  • Learn new skills and improve them by using crystal shards.
